医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
逃避医疗保险登记截止日期可能代价高昂安吉拉·杜波依斯 (Angela M. Du Bois) 是北卡罗来纳州达勒姆市的一名退休软件测试员，她并不打算更换她的 UnitedHealthcare Medicare Advantage 计划。随着 12 月 7 日最后期限的临近，她并不担心选择另一种私人经营的健康保险替代原始医疗保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Dodging-the-Medicare-enrollment-deadline-can-be-costly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Dodging-the-Medicare-enrollment-deadline-can-be-costly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5082c941-d7eb-4d8f-ac70-9d3df5704953 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 12:50:53 -0500 Dodging the Medicare enrollment deadline can be costly
候选人在第四次共和党初选辩论中发生冲突，但避免谈论堕胎周三晚上的第四场共和党总统初选辩论中，四名候选人就从自己的当选性到前总统唐纳德·特朗普的持续领跑地位等各个方面展开了激烈的争论。从未提及堕胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Candidates-clashed-but-avoided-talk-of-abortion-at-4th-GOP-primary-debate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Candidates-clashed-but-avoided-talk-of-abortion-at-4th-GOP-primary-debate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=310516ca-70b1-42d3-a596-e963a541d1e5 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 12:41:10 -0500 Candidates clashed but avoided talk of abortion at 4th GOP primary debate

科罗拉多州指责拜登团队和制药商推迟加拿大进口根据 KFF Health News 获得的一份州报告，科罗拉多州官员表示，他们从加拿大进口更便宜药品的计划因制药商的反对和拜登政府的不作为而受阻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Colorado-blames-Biden-team-and-drugmakers-for-delaying-Canadian-imports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Colorado-blames-Biden-team-and-drugmakers-for-delaying-Canadian-imports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2244b9dc-a0e7-466e-b385-2d1482ac4e8e Thu, 07 Dec 2023 07:45:42 -0500 Colorado blames Biden team and drugmakers for delaying Canadian imports
从 LED 屏幕到基因：蓝光对果蝇衰老和 m6A 甲基化的影响研究人员利用多组学图谱创建了果蝇模型，以阐明日常低强度蓝光暴露 (BLE) 的生物学机制和影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/From-LED-screens-to-genes-The-effects-of-blue-light-on-aging-and-m6A-methylation-in-fruit-苍蝇.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/From-LED-screens-to-genes-The-effects-of-blue-light-on-aging-and-m6A-methylation-in-fruit- flies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64db7072-ef71-44ff-91ef-79c36da00537 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 07:08:00 -0500 From LED screens to genes: The effects of blue light on aging and m6A methylation in fruit flies
